is.ru.ttt

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • is.ru.ttt.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    The Player class maintains the players.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      The player function is the default constructor for the class.
      Player(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Boolean turn)
      The player function is another constructor which takes in two variables creates a player.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getInserted()
      The getInserted function returns the arraylist.
      java.lang.String getPlayerName()
      The getPlayerName function returns the player name.
      java.lang.Boolean getTurn()
      The getTurn function returns true or false, which indicates if it's the player turn to play.
      void insertIntoTable(int cell)
      The insertIntoTable function inserts a certain cell into an arraylist which maintains the cells for certain player.
      java.lang.String toJson()
      The toJson function creates a json string and returns it.
      void turn()
      The turn function updates the turn variable so that the player who just completed his turn will not get another turn until the other player has finished his turn.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player()
        The player function is the default constructor for the class. The function initializes the playername and myturn variables.

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name,
      java.lang.Boolean turn)
        The player function is another constructor which takes in two variables creates a player.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the player.
        turn - Specifies if it's this players turn to play or not.

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayerName

        public java.lang.String getPlayerName()
        The getPlayerName function returns the player name.
        Returns:
        playername.

      • getTurn

        public java.lang.Boolean getTurn()
        The getTurn function returns true or false, which indicates if it's the player turn to play.
        Returns:
        myturn.

      • turn

        public void turn()
        The turn function updates the turn variable so that the player who just completed his turn will not get another turn until the other player has finished his turn.

      • insertIntoTable

        public void insertIntoTable(int cell)
                     throws OutOfBoundsException,
                            AlreadyOccupiedException
        The insertIntoTable function inserts a certain cell into an arraylist which maintains the cells for certain player.
        Parameters:
        cell - Specifies a location on the game board.
        Throws:
        OutOfBoundsException - This exception is thrown if the cell location is out of the board range.
        AlreadyOccupiedException - This exception is thrown if the cell is already occupied.

      • getInserted

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getInserted()
        The getInserted function returns the arraylist.
        Returns:
        arraylist.

        public java.lang.String toJson()
        The toJson function creates a json string and returns it.
        Returns:
        json string.
